Posts.Content: D4619awn wrote: My biopsy showed DCIS with a very small cancer surrounded by atypical lobular hyperplasia.  When the mammogram was done after surgery the clip was on the edge so he went back in and took more out.  I know a few people who were originally diagnosed with DCIS and it turned out to be more than that.  I am a wreck, don't know how I am going to make it through the night.  Friends and family try to be supportive but no one knows how this feels unless you are going through it.  Any advice to get through the night???? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Appt. at 10:45 tomorrow morning to get results from Lumpectomy D4619awn ckachoo

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2013 09:57PM D4619awn wrote: Hi:  I am wishing you the best.  I had my biopsy and lumpectomy...I get my results tomorrow at 10:45.  I am a wreck. I don't know how I am going to sleep tonight.  the waiting game is the worst part of this.  I just want to find out exactly where I stand and what I need to do...
Posts.Title: Worried waiting on biopsy results 3 more days Kimmie114 D4619awn
